cmp: 支 ((a measure word)/to support/to sustain/to erect/to raise/branch/division/to draw money)
mng: drum, to drum, to strike, to rouse, to bulge, to swell

to agitate, to arouse, to instigate, to encite
gongs and drums, Chinese percussion instruments
to beat a drum, to play a drum, (fig.) to feel nervous
